name: Comparison Table 14
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign layout_gap = section.settings.layout_gap
  assign layout_gap_mobile = section.settings.layout_gap_mobile

  assign main_product = section.settings.main_product
  assign custom_image = section.settings.custom_image
  assign custom_title = section.settings.custom_title
  assign first_icon = section.settings.first_icon
  assign first_value = section.settings.first_value
  assign second_icon = section.settings.second_icon
  assign second_value = section.settings.second_value
  assign third_icon = section.settings.third_icon
  assign third_value = section.settings.third_value
  assign fourth_icon = section.settings.fourth_icon
  assign fourth_value = section.settings.fourth_value
  assign fifth_icon = section.settings.fifth_icon
  assign fifth_value = section.settings.fifth_value
  assign sixth_icon = section.settings.sixth_icon
  assign sixth_value = section.settings.sixth_value

  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign rows_mt = section.settings.rows_mt
  assign rows_mt_mobile = section.settings.rows_mt_mobile

  assign row_gap = section.settings.row_gap
  assign row_gap_mobile = section.settings.row_gap_mobile
  assign row_mt = section.settings.row_mt
  assign row_mt_mobile = section.settings.row_mt_mobile

  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size
  assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile
  assign icon_yes_color = section.settings.icon_yes_color
  assign icon_yes_bg_color = section.settings.icon_yes_bg_color
  assign icon_no_color = section.settings.icon_no_color
  assign icon_no_bg_color = section.settings.icon_no_bg_color

  assign value_size = section.settings.value_size
  assign value_size_mobile = section.settings.value_size_mobile
  assign value_color = section.settings.value_color
  assign value_custom = section.settings.value_custom
  assign value_font = section.settings.value_font
  assign value_height = section.settings.value_height

  assign versus_color = section.settings.versus_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}  
  {{  value_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}  

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .comparison-layout-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: {{ layout_gap_mobile }}px;       
  }

  .comparison-left-{{ section.id }},
  .comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }} !important;
  }

  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: calc(100% - {{ image_border_thickness | times: 2 }}px);
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .comparison-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-weight: 700;
  } 

  .comparison-rows-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ rows_mt_mobile }}px;
    max-width: fit-content;
  }

  .comparison-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-top: {{ row_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-row-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: left;
    gap: {{ row_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} img,
  .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }} circle {
    fill: {{ icon_yes_bg_color }};
  }

  .comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }} path,
  .comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }} polygon {
    fill: {{ icon_yes_color }}
  }

  .comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }} circle {
    fill: {{ icon_no_bg_color }};
  }

  .comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }} rect,
  .comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }} path {
    fill: {{ icon_no_color }}
  }

  .comparison-value-{{ section.id }} {    
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ value_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ value_color }};
    line-height: {{ value_height }}%;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .comparison-versus-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: translateY(0%);
    width: 50%;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .comparison-versus-{{ section.id }} svg {
    fill: {{ versus_color }};
  }

  .comparison-right-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .comparison-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .comparison-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    min-width: 0 !important;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 65%;
    transform: translateY(-60%);
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    z-index: 2;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 0px;
  }

  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 0px;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .comparison-layout-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;      
      gap: {{ layout_gap }}px;   
    }

    .comparison-left-{{ section.id }},
    .comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }} !important;
    }

    .comparison-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} .comparison-title-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0 {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-rows-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ rows_mt }}px;
    }

    .comparison-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-top: {{ row_mt }}px;
    }

    .comparison-row-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ row_gap }}px;
     
    }    

    .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-value-{{ section.id }} {    
      font-size: {{ value_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-versus-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 100%;
    }

    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      top: 60%;
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .comparison-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if value_custom %}
  <style>
    .comparison-value-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ value_font.family }}, {{ value_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ value_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ value_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
    }       
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .comparison-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/9; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }    
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
      } 

      .comparison-versus-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: translateY(9%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-image-{{ section.id }}{
       aspect-ratio: 12/9; 
      }

      .comparison-versus-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: translateY(0%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }

      .comparison-versus-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: translateY(5%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-60%);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-60%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }

    .comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} .comparison-title-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0 {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} .comparison-title-{{ section.id }} {
        padding: 0 {{ arrow_size }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}  {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}  {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}  {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if content_align_mobile == 'right' %}
  <style>
    .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }

    .comparison-row-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: right;
    }

    .comparison-value-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: right;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if content_align == 'right' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }

      .comparison-row-{{ section.id }} {
        justify-content: right;
      }

      .comparison-value-{{ section.id }} {
        text-align: right;
      }
    }   
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} comparison-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="comparison-layout-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="comparison-left-{{ section.id }}">
          <{% if main_product != blank %}a href="{{ main_product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="comparison-image-{{ section.id }}">
            {% if custom_image != blank %}
              <img src="{{ custom_image | image_url }}" alt="{{  custom_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
            {% elsif main_product.featured_image != blank %}
              <img src="{{ main_product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ main_product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
            {% else %}
              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
            {% endif %}   
          </{% if main_product != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
          {% if custom_title != blank %}
            <p class="comparison-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ custom_title }}</p>
          {% elsif main_product != blank  %}  
            <p class="comparison-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ main_product.title }}</p>
          {% endif %}
          <div class="comparison-rows-{{ section.id }}">
            {% if first_value != blank %}
              <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if first_icon != 'none' %}
                  <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if first_icon == 'yes' %}
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                    {% elsif first_icon == 'no' %}  
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><rect x="13.87" y="6.29" width="2.26" height="10.2" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,20.18c-.97,0-1.76.79-1.76,1.76s.79,1.76,1.76,1.76,1.76-.79,1.76-1.76-.79-1.76-1.76-1.76h0Z" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>                
                {% endif %}
                <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ first_value }}</p>
              </div>
            {% endif %}
            {% if second_value != blank %}
              <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if second_icon != 'none' %}
                  <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if second_icon == 'yes' %}
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                    {% elsif second_icon == 'no' %}  
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><rect x="13.87" y="6.29" width="2.26" height="10.2" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,20.18c-.97,0-1.76.79-1.76,1.76s.79,1.76,1.76,1.76,1.76-.79,1.76-1.76-.79-1.76-1.76-1.76h0Z" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                    {% endif %}

            {% endif %}
            {% if third_value != blank %}
              <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">

                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>

            {% endif %}
            {% if fourth_value != blank %}

                    {% if fourth_icon == 'yes' %}
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                    {% elsif fourth_icon == 'no' %}  
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><rect x="13.87" y="6.29" width="2.26" height="10.2" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,20.18c-.97,0-1.76.79-1.76,1.76s.79,1.76,1.76,1.76,1.76-.79,1.76-1.76-.79-1.76-1.76-1.76h0Z" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>

                    {% if fifth_icon == 'yes' %}
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>

                    {% if sixth_icon == 'yes' %}

                    {% elsif sixth_icon == 'no' %}

                <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ sixth_value }}</p>
              </div>
            {% endif %}  
          </div>                 
        </div>
        <div class="comparison-versus-{{ section.id }}">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="a" viewBox="0 0 310 250"><circle cx="270.21" cy="231.77" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m253.84,4.54l-46.9,113.71h-121.6L38.45,4.54h72.96l34.74,97.21L180.88,4.54h72.96Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m251.09,211.01v.07c-.01,28.33-17.47,33.47-52.67,33.47h-104.6c-35.22,0-52.67-11.95-52.67-40.34h68.88c0,18.97,7.88,22.2,22.93,22.2h26.32c15.04,0,20.68-3.08,20.7-16-.01-13.43-7.85-13.53-22.75-13.63h-63.85c-36.36,0-52.22-11.82-52.22-32.41,0-28.39,17.45-33.53,52.67-33.53h104.6c35.22,0,52.67,11.95,52.67,40.34h-68.88c0-18.96-8.02-22.09-23.07-22.09h-26.32c-15.05,0-20.55,2.95-20.55,15.91s7.86,12.97,22.81,13.07h63.8c36.32,0,52.2,12.39,52.22,32.94Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
        </div>                      
        <div class="comparison-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="comparison-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
            <button class="comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>  
            <button class="comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>   
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                <div class="comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                  <{% if block.settings.product != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="comparison-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.custom_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.custom_image | image_url }}" alt="{{  block.settings.custom_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% elsif block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}   
                  </{% if block.settings.product != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                  {% if block.settings.custom_title != blank %}
                    <p class="comparison-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.custom_title }}</p>
                  {% elsif block.settings.product != blank  %}  
                    <p class="comparison-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                  <div class="comparison-rows-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.first_value != blank %}
                      <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.first_icon != 'none' %}
                          <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.first_icon == 'yes' %}
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% elsif block.settings.first_icon == 'no' %}  
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><rect x="13.87" y="6.29" width="2.26" height="10.2" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,20.18c-.97,0-1.76.79-1.76,1.76s.79,1.76,1.76,1.76,1.76-.79,1.76-1.76-.79-1.76-1.76-1.76h0Z" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% endif %}
                          </div>                      
                        {% endif %}
                        <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.second_value != blank %}
                      <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.second_icon != 'none' %}
                          <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.second_icon == 'yes' %}
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% elsif block.settings.second_icon == 'no' %}  
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><rect x="13.87" y="6.29" width="2.26" height="10.2" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,20.18c-.97,0-1.76.79-1.76,1.76s.79,1.76,1.76,1.76,1.76-.79,1.76-1.76-.79-1.76-1.76-1.76h0Z" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% endif %}
                          </div>                       
                        {% endif %}
                        <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.third_value != blank %}
                      <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.third_icon != 'none' %}
                          <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.third_icon == 'yes' %}
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% elsif block.settings.third_icon == 'no' %}

                            {% endif %}
                          </div>                      
                        {% endif %}
                        <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.fourth_value != blank %}
                      <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.fourth_icon != 'none' %}
                          <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.fourth_icon == 'yes' %}
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% elsif block.settings.fourth_icon == 'no' %}

                            {% endif %}
                          </div>                        
                        {% endif %}
                        <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.fourth_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.fifth_value != blank %}
                      <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.fifth_icon != 'none' %}
                          <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.fifth_icon == 'yes' %}
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% elsif block.settings.fifth_icon == 'no' %}  
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><rect x="13.87" y="6.29" width="2.26" height="10.2" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,20.18c-.97,0-1.76.79-1.76,1.76s.79,1.76,1.76,1.76,1.76-.79,1.76-1.76-.79-1.76-1.76-1.76h0Z" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>

                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.sixth_value != blank %}
                      <div class="comparison-row-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.sixth_icon != 'none' %}
                          <div class="comparison-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.sixth_icon == 'yes' %}
                              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }}" id="a" viewBox="0 0 30 30"><circle cx="15" cy="15" r="13.69" style="  stroke-width:0px;"/><path d="m15,29.54C6.98,29.54.46,23.02.46,15S6.98.46,15,.46s14.54,6.52,14.54,14.54-6.52,14.54-14.54,14.54Zm0-27.37C7.92,2.17,2.17,7.92,2.17,15s5.76,12.83,12.83,12.83,12.83-5.76,12.83-12.83S22.07,2.17,15,2.17Z" style="stroke-width:0px;"/><polygon points="13.04 20.07 8.45 15.47 9.66 14.26 13.04 17.65 20.15 10.53 21.36 11.74 13.04 20.07" style="stroke-width:0px;"/></svg>
                            {% elsif block.settings.sixth_icon == 'no' %}

                            {% endif %}
                          </div>                       
                        {% endif %}
                        <p class="comparison-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sixth_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}  
                  </div>                 
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>                    
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script>
  function loadSwiper(callback) {
    if (window.Swiper) {
      callback();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js";
      script.onload = callback;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }

  function initComparisonTable14(sectionId) {
    const slider = new Swiper(`.comparison-slider-${sectionId}`, {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.comparison-btn-next-${sectionId}`,
        prevEl: `.comparison-btn-prev-${sectionId}`,
      },
    });
  }

  function initializeAllComparisonTable14Sections() {
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="shopify-section-"]');
    sections.forEach(section => {
      if (section.querySelector('.comparison-{{ section.id }}')) {
        const sectionId = section.id.replace('shopify-section-', '');
        loadSwiper(() => initComparisonTable14(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeAllComparisonTable14Sections);
  } else {
    initializeAllComparisonTable14Sections();
  }

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', (event) => {
      const sectionId = event.detail.sectionId;
      if (event.target.querySelector('.comparison-{{ section.id }}')) {
        loadSwiper(() => initComparisonTable14(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }
</script>
